meanings.definition: Not attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The uncomely painting was quickly removed from the gallery.
meanings.sent2: She tried to fix her uncomely hair before the party.
meanings.sent3: The uncomely scarecrow made the birds laugh.
meanings.sent4: The uncomely clouds darkened the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent5: The uncomely building stood out among the elegant architecture.

meanings.sent1: His uncomely behavior at the formal dinner shocked everyone.
meanings.sent2: Wearing flip-flops to a wedding is considered uncomely.
meanings.sent3: The uncomely dance moves made the audience cringe.
meanings.sent4: Her uncomely choice of words left a lasting impact on the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The uncomely decision to cancel the event disappointed many attendees.
